name: Too much Art
description:
TriJam #212

Theme : Too much

Play a museum that has too many works of art, sell as many works as possible without making too much money or the taxes will catch you ! 

How to play ?

The icons represent the works you have to sell, the number displayed on top represents its current value. Click on it to sell it. If you exceed the maximum money limit, the taxes will catch you and you will lose. But if you go below the minimum limit you won't be able to pay the rent, so you'll lose. Try to get as much money as you can without going over the limit to earn points. 

This is my first GameJam, I started creating video games 2 years ago. I'm happy to have participated in this TriJam. I made this game in 3 hours and 30 minutes. The visuals were generated by MidJourney and Stable Diffusion (I'm a poor graphic designer). 

I hope you like the game !

TruitoxVRC
